DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether fluoxetine , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor commonly use depression , enhance visual recovery acute ischemic stroke .
DOC.brief_title: Fluoxetine Visual Recovery After Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: MRIconfirmed acute ischemic stroke result isolated homonymous visual field loss .
